snippet.title: Missing Translation Trailer
snippet.description:
Gamejolt Profile:
http://gamejolt.com/games/adventure/missing-translation/34537/

"Missing Translation" is an upcoming game that will be launched on Android and PC.

It's inspired on classic PC point & click games but also on FEZ and other modern titles. It's all centered around puzzles and the plot is minimal.

Credits:
Ludipe(@Ludipe) - Production | Code | Design
Gustavo(@gustavo__san) - Art | Testing
Albert(@Albert_composer) - Music | Testing
Tice(@ticebilla) - Sound Design | Testing

Alpixel Games(@AlpixelGames)

Devlog:
http://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?topic=39679.0
